scenario_text.value: Kaito? What are you up to?
You look kind of upset. Is something wrong?
Oh, I was just thinking about Miu.

She didn’t want anything to do with me. And
after we all went through to save her...

(He seems pretty out of sorts. Kaito really
is hung up on his sister, isn’t he?)
Tell me, Takuma. Did I do something wrong?
What should I say?
You did nothing wrong.
She’s just upset.
She doesn’t mean it.

No, you did nothing wrong. After all, who
wouldn’t be concerned about their sister?
Takuma...!

So don’t lose heart, Kaito. I’m sure she’ll
appreciate how you feel soon enough.

Yeah, you’re right. Thanks, Takuma. I feel
a bit better now.
I think Miu’s just upset.

Don’t you think now’s the time for you to be
warm and accepting?
Isn’t that what big brothers do?
I mean, maybe but...

Being accepting isn’t really my strong suit,
you know?
I just can’t help but speak my mind.

I don’t think she means it. She’s just hiding
how she really feels because she’s shy.

So I don’t think you have anything to worry
about. Really.

You mean it? You think she’s just being shy?
I’d like to think that.

You know, I want to be a good older brother
for Miu.
I want her to think of me as one.

Someone strong, who she can rely on. Someone
who’ll protect her. That sort of big brother.

I’m not saying she should thank me for it or
anything, but I do wish she wouldn’t hate me.

Especially now that we’re in this world. That
makes it mean even more to me.
